sentences.sContent: Once an isolated highland, it has been the home shared by people of more than 10 nationalities, with pure blue sky, clear and beautiful lake as well as the legendary matriarchal community.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once an isolated highland, it has been the home shared by people of more than 10 nationalities, with pure blue sky, clear and beautiful lake as well as the legendary matriarchal community.
sentences.sCn: 这里曾是与世界隔离的地方，一个10多个民族混居的地方。 有高原上湛蓝纯净的天空，清澈美丽的湖水，还有传说中的母系社会。

sentences.sContent: There are a number of Highland Games held through the highlands Scotland.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are a number of Highland Games held through the highlands Scotland.
sentences.sCn: 有大量的高地游戏存在于苏格兰的丘陵地带。

words.tran: 苏格兰高地的人；高地人

trans.tranOther: relating to the Scottish Highlands or its people
